data.name: Femdom Lines: Total Obedience Pack
data.detailed_description:
Femdom Lines: Total Obedience Pack, created in cooperation with the practicing dominatrix and talented writer, Miss Vey. Adds three additional characters to the base game with their unique tasks, taunts, personalities and, of course, achievements!

Each of these characters have different kinks, preferences and wishes: from gentle Emily to cruel Erica and netorare-loving Vey — you will have the most intense femdom experience that you can have. As a pathetic writing slave, of course ;)

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 16:9 aspect ratio
